data.text: Fuwawawa… Oh, if it isn't Nature and Ikuno.
data.name: Matikanetannhauser
data.processed: <story>Fuwawawa… Oh, if it isn't Nature and Ikuno.

data.text: Oh, Tannhauser, mornin.
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed: <story>Oh, Tannhauser, mornin.

data.text:
Good morning, Tannhauser-san. 
You're up early today.
data.name: Ikuno Dictus
data.processed:
<story>Good morning, Tannhauser-san. 
<story>You're up early today.

data.text:
I could say the same to you two… 
Ikuno, were you the first to the bathroom this morning?
data.name: Matikanetannhauser
data.processed:
<story>I could say the same to you two… 
<story>Ikuno, were you the first to the bathroom this morning?

data.text:
No, that goes to Nature-san. 
I was second by merely a head.
data.name: Ikuno Dictus
data.processed:
<story>No, that goes to Nature-san. 
<story>I was second by merely a head.

data.text:
Come on, we both made it to the entrance at pretty 
much the same time… Anyways, let's not talk about 
this anymore, it's a bit embarrassing…
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>Come on, we both made it to the entrance at pretty 
<story>much the same time… Anyways, let's not talk about 
<story>this anymore, it's a bit embarrassing…

data.text:
Eh… why not? Nature, you're so amazing! 
I hash to… work sho much harder… Hawawa… mrrmph hmph.
data.name: Matikanetannhauser
data.processed:
<story>Eh… why not? Nature, you're so amazing! 
<story>I hash to… work sho much harder… Hawawa… mrrmph hmph.

data.text: Come again?
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed: <story>Come again?

data.text:
Pwah! I'm full and my eyes are wide open! 
Okay, we should probably get going now!
data.name: Matikanetannhauser
data.processed:
<story>Pwah! I'm full and my eyes are wide open! 
<story>Okay, we should probably get going now!

data.text:
Oh…? You want to head out while we're still 
in our training clothes? Does that mean we will 
be changing our clothes when we get there?
data.name: Ikuno Dictus
data.processed:
<story>Oh…? You want to head out while we're still 
<story>in our training clothes? Does that mean we will 
<story>be changing our clothes when we get there?

data.text:
Speaking of, Tannhauser… were you 
planning on doing some training this morning?
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>Speaking of, Tannhauser… were you 
<story>planning on doing some training this morning?

data.text:
You had that huge mock race yesterday, right? 
You're probably still real tired from it.
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>You had that huge mock race yesterday, right? 
<story>You're probably still real tired from it.

data.text:
Hmm, I guess I am a little tired? 
But the thing is…
data.name: Matikanetannhauser
data.processed:
<story>Hmm, I guess I am a little tired? 
<story>But the thing is…

data.text:
I want to train more 
since I lost yesterday.
data.name: Matikanetannhauser
data.processed:
<story>I want to train more 
<story>since I lost yesterday.

data.text:
Hmm, I did as much as I could to prepare for the race and 
even thought to myself that "this race is going to go well! Mun!"
data.name: Matikanetannhauser
data.processed:
<story>Hmm, I did as much as I could to prepare for the race and 
<story>even thought to myself that "this race is going to go well! Mun!"

data.text:
But I ended up losing! The other racers were really strong 
though! I guess I ended up having a bad showing, huh?
data.name: Matikanetannhauser
data.processed:
<story>But I ended up losing! The other racers were really strong 
<story>though! I guess I ended up having a bad showing, huh?

data.name: ネイチャ＆イクノ
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: That being said!
data.name: Matikanetannhauser
data.processed: <story>That being said!

data.name: ネイチャ＆イクノ
data.processed: <story>!

data.text:
I lost because I wasn't good enough, right? 
So all I need to do is get better!
data.name: Matikanetannhauser
data.processed:
<story>I lost because I wasn't good enough, right? 
<story>So all I need to do is get better!

data.text:
So let's get to training, 
and more training! Ei ei mun!
data.name: Matikanetannhauser
data.processed:
<story>So let's get to training, 
<story>and more training! Ei ei mun!

data.text:
Ahaha… Ah well… I guess this is 
just how she is, wouldn't you say, Ikuno?
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha… Ah well… I guess this is 
<story>just how she is, wouldn't you say, Ikuno?

data.text:
Hehe, I guess you're correct, Nature-san… 
Tannhauser-san, if you wouldn't mind, could she and I join…
data.name: Ikuno Dictus
data.processed:
<story>Hehe, I guess you're correct, Nature-san… 
<story>Tannhauser-san, if you wouldn't mind, could she and I join…

data.text: Machitaaaan!!
data.name: Twin Turbo
data.processed: <story>Machitaaaan!!

data.text:
Woah, Turbo? Hold on, wait a second, you came all the way from 
the Miho dorm!? You're so fast and energetic this morning!
data.name: Matikanetannhauser
data.processed:
<story>Woah, Turbo? Hold on, wait a second, you came all the way from 
<story>the Miho dorm!? You're so fast and energetic this morning!

data.text:
Machitan!! Hurry up and race me!! 
Come on, race me, race me, race me!!
data.name: Twin Turbo
data.processed:
<story>Machitan!! Hurry up and race me!! 
<story>Come on, race me, race me, race me!!

data.text:
Eh…? Eh? What's with you, Turbo? 
You've got more energy than usual.
data.name: Matikanetannhauser
data.processed:
<story>Eh…? Eh? What's with you, Turbo? 
<story>You've got more energy than usual.

data.text:
Hmm… Turbo-san, were you perhaps also inspired 
after watching Tannhauser-san race yesterday?
data.name: Ikuno Dictus
data.processed:
<story>Hmm… Turbo-san, were you perhaps also inspired 
<story>after watching Tannhauser-san race yesterday?

data.text: Eh…? "Also…?"
data.name: Matikanetannhauser
data.processed: <story>Eh…? "Also…?"

data.text:
Yup! Machitan was so amazing yesterday! 
You were going KUWA, GUWAA, and UWAAA until the very end!
data.name: Twin Turbo
data.processed:
<story>Yup! Machitan was so amazing yesterday! 
<story>You were going KUWA, GUWAA, and UWAAA until the very end!

data.text:
And so I wanna go UWAA too! So let's race!! 
Oh, Ikuno, you're gonna join!? Then let's all race together!!
data.name: Twin Turbo
data.processed:
<story>And so I wanna go UWAA too! So let's race!! 
<story>Oh, Ikuno, you're gonna join!? Then let's all race together!!

data.text:
Ah, umm… If you don't mind, 
count me in too, please…
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>Ah, umm… If you don't mind, 
<story>count me in too, please…

data.text:
You too, Nature!? Then we've got four!! 
Let's go and race, race, race!!
data.name: Twin Turbo
data.processed:
<story>You too, Nature!? Then we've got four!! 
<story>Let's go and race, race, race!!

data.text: Girls…
data.name: Matikanetannhauser
data.processed: <story>Girls…

data.text:
Hehehe… I guess we're really doing this! 
Every, one, mun!
data.name: Matikanetannhauser
data.processed:
<story>Hehehe… I guess we're really doing this! 
<story>Every, one, mun!

data.text: Owwie owwie! Phew…!!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed: <story>Owwie owwie! Phew…!!

data.text:
Kita-chan, are you okay? The training that our 
instructor had us do yesterday was really intense… 
My muscles are still aching too…
data.name: Satono Diamond
data.processed:
<story>Kita-chan, are you okay? The training that our 
<story>instructor had us do yesterday was really intense… 
<story>My muscles are still aching too…

data.text:
Nnghh… But, I'm still okay!! Let's go, Dia-chan! We've gotta 
get to the training center before it gets too crowded!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Nnghh… But, I'm still okay!! Let's go, Dia-chan! We've gotta 
<story>get to the training center before it gets too crowded!

data.text:
Kita-chan… are you sure you're okay? 
You're not pushing yourself too hard, are you?
data.name: Satono Diamond
data.processed:
<story>Kita-chan… are you sure you're okay? 
<story>You're not pushing yourself too hard, are you?

data.text:
Hmm, I wouldn't say I'm pushing myself too hard… 
More like I'm colliding with my limits?
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Hmm, I wouldn't say I'm pushing myself too hard… 
<story>More like I'm colliding with my limits?

data.text:
How do I say this… There are "walls" that are 
blocking my path forward… so I'm colliding with 
them in a huge bang! Something like that!?
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>How do I say this… There are "walls" that are 
<story>blocking my path forward… so I'm colliding with 
<story>them in a huge bang! Something like that!?

data.text:
It may hurt in the beginning and it may be really tough… But 
if you don't collide with these "walls", you'll never get past 
them! And that means you'll never move forward!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>It may hurt in the beginning and it may be really tough… But 
<story>if you don't collide with these "walls", you'll never get past 
<story>them! And that means you'll never move forward!

data.text:
That's why… Owwie!! 
I-I'm doing this so I can keep moving forward…! Nngh!!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>That's why… Owwie!! 
<story>I-I'm doing this so I can keep moving forward…! Nngh!!

data.text:
I see… You're right, 
I feel the exact same way.
data.name: Satono Diamond
data.processed:
<story>I see… You're right, 
<story>I feel the exact same way.

data.text:
Alrighty, let's go, Kita-chan! 
And let's make sure we get a lot of stretching done too ♪
data.name: Satono Diamond
data.processed:
<story>Alrighty, let's go, Kita-chan! 
<story>And let's make sure we get a lot of stretching done too ♪

data.text: Dia-chan…! Yup, let's do it!!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed: <story>Dia-chan…! Yup, let's do it!!

data.text:
Teio-san? 
What might you be staring at…?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Teio-san? 
<story>What might you be staring at…?

data.text:
Hmm? Ah, don't worry about it… 
But I'm starting to get really excited.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Hmm? Ah, don't worry about it… 
<story>But I'm starting to get really excited.

data.text: Excited…?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Excited…?

data.text:
Yup! I'm excited to see the 
dreams that are yet to come true!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Yup! I'm excited to see the 
<story>dreams that are yet to come true!!
